article_title: [Vtub] Saba 時隔一個月發推！向粉絲道新年快樂、預告一月有望回歸
content_raw:
https://images.plurk.com/2lQdlmm0GR39nww2gKbTC0.png原文標題：VTuber Saba時隔一個月發推！向粉絲道新年快樂、預告一月有望回歸

原文網址：https://game.udn.com/game/story/122089/9231647遊戲角落／油依https://uc.udn.com.tw/photo/2025/12/29/0/34057042.jpg遊戲角落合成 圖／YouTube @SamekoSaba

知名個人勢英語系 VTuber「Saba」Sameko Saba 於 11 月宣布因健康問題，近期直播與
活動將不太穩定。今（29）日她終於在 X（舊稱 Twitter）發文，除了向粉絲獻上新年祝
福外，也暗示自己預計在 1 月左右回歸。

| a-yo ho ho ho!
| merry christmas and happy new years gamers
|
| Thank you all for your patience with me throughout the years as I learn to
| navigate some recurring health issues.
|
| I'm still learning. Sometimes i'm good at balancing things and other times
| I'm terrible at it and my health and productivity suffers for it. It's so
| easy to feel down when my body also feels like, well, shit.
| But in the end, so long as I get back up again, I'll do just that and
| keep'er goin as best I can. Just at my old lady lightkeeper pace
| I'm so lucky to be supported by such kind friends and folks. Thank you all
| so much.
|
| I'm wishing each of you and your families health and happiness as we enter
| the new year! I will see you in January!https://x.com/samekosaba/status/2005312667938877629Saba 先向大家送上聖誕與新年祝福，感謝粉絲一直以來的等待與包容。她表示自己仍在
學習如何面對反覆出現的健康問題，狀況良好時能兼顧生活與工作，但有時失衡就會影響
到健康與直播安排，身體狀況不好時便會讓她的情緒容易低落。

不過只要還有能力她就會持續前行，只是腳步會慢一些，她也感謝自己非常幸運能受到善
良的朋友與觀眾支持。文章最後，她祝福粉絲與其家人在新的一年都能健康幸福，並寫下
：「我們一月見！」看來最快有機會在一月迎接 Saba 的回歸。


--
清廉正直射命丸文，世界第一可愛https://i.imgur.com/XqOptr2.jpghttps://i.imgur.com/zGCOdHq.jpghttps://i.imgur.com/SJR03hx.jpghttps://i.imgur.com/nUbq2HQ.jpghttps://i.imgur.com/0yn2DP5.jpg--
